subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * It may be implausible to use ''[[water chestnut]]'' synonymously or confusingly, which is also synonymous to {{taxlink|Eleocharis dulcis|species|ver=180618}} which is unrelated to [[water caltrop]].
